name: Collar
description: $COLLAR is the real launchpad for shibarium and supports all tokens of shibs ecosystem! check us out we are building a bullish launchpad, token creator, locker and more. COLLAR was birthed to create an all-in-one launchpad for users of the Shibarium chain. In order to support Shibariums ecosystem. $SHIB, $BONE, $LEASH, $CLAW and $COLLAR holders will be able to use the launchpad without any additional fees.
